entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dumbledore mentions dementors as a presence in the alleyway. ("We do, in fact, have a witness to the presence of dementors in that alleyway")

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: Dumbledore mentions Dudley Dursley as another witness to the presence of dementors. ("other than Dudley Dursley, I mean")

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a character who interrupts Dumbledore and seems hesitant when confronted with the presence of dementors. ("Enough, enough!" "We havenâ€™t got time to listen to more taradiddles")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who seems to be in charge and is trying to defend the accused. ("We do, in fact, have a witness to the presence of dementors")

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: The Wizengamot is an organization that seems to be involved in the proceedings. ("The Wizengamot fell silent again")

relationships.description: Dumbledore seems to be a member of the Wizengamot, as he is speaking on their behalf. ("The Wizengamot fell silent again")
Fudge also seems to be a member of the Wizengamot, as he is interrupting Dumbledore. ("Enough, enough!")
Dumbledore and Fudge seem to be on opposite sides of the argument, as Dumbledore is trying to defend the accused. ("We do, in fact, have a witness to the presence of dementors")
